data.prayer: Please, convict the 10,028 believers in Sabah, Malaysia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sabah, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Sabah, Malaysia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Sabah who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Sabah.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Buginese people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Sabah prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Sabah, Malaysia to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Sabah, Malaysia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
